definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

pinyin: yi3 xian1 an4 bi3 luo4 wan2 tong2

definition: acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)

pinyin: dui4 yi3 xian1 an1 ji1 fen1

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脫水和發燒可用口服補液鹽和對乙酰氨基酚進行治療。

sentences.english: It can be broken down to yield acetoacetate.
sentences.chinese: 它可以被分解成乙酰乙酸。

sentences.english: The acetoacetyl functionality can reduce solution viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 乙酰乙酰基的引入，可降低體系溶液粘度。

sentences.english: The acetoacetyl functionality can reduce solution viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 乙酰乙酰基的引入，可降低體系溶液粘度。

sentences.english: The compound stabilizer of water is synthetized from the by product in production of acetyl chloride.
sentences.chinese: 採用乙酰氯副產物爲原料合成複合水質穩定劑。

sentences.english: The mode of action of V-type organophosphate poisons on acetylcholinesterase has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了V類毒劑與乙酰膽鹼酯酶的作用方式。

sentences.english: Color reaction with acetylacetone is used to determine the formaldehyde content in fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 織物中甲醛的測定大多采用乙酰丙酮的顯色反應。

sentences.english: To study the isoniazid acetylator Phenotype.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究異煙肼乙酰化遺傳型。

sentences.english: Chitosan is the N- deacetylated derivative of chitin.
sentences.chinese: 殼聚糖是幾丁質的脫乙酰基衍生物。

sentences.english: The acetylation imparts greater stability to the dimensions of the hardboard.
sentences.chinese: 乙酰化使硬質纖維板具較大的尺寸穩定性。

sentences.english: The invention relates to the inhibition of histone deacetylase.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及組蛋白脫乙酰基酶的抑制。

sentences.english: Another possibility is acetazolamide, one of the first diuretics discovered.
sentences.chinese: 另一中可行性藥物是乙酰唑胺，這是一種利尿的發現。

sentences.english: Thus, the acetylation was a useful method of wood surface nonpolarization.
sentences.chinese: 乙酰化處理是降低木材表面極性的一種有效方法。

sentences.english: In eukaryotes, the acetylation of histones was discovered many years ago.
sentences.chinese: 在真核生物中，很早就發現了組蛋白的乙酰化現象。

sentences.english: It has been found to be an inhibitor of the enzyme acetylcholinesterase.
sentences.chinese: 它已被認爲是抑制乙酰膽鹼酯酶的酶。

sentences.english: Infants in the non-acetylcholine receptor antibodies, its pathogenesis and heredity.
sentences.chinese: 病嬰中無乙酰膽鹼受體抗體，其發病機制與遺傳有關。
